first.question: How much does membership cost?
first.answer: The membership fee is {{price}} rubles per month. This allows you to use all the features of the platform, including premium content and participation in closed events.

second.question: What are the advantages of membership?
second.answer: Membership opens up a wide range of materials, exclusive collections and activities, as well as gives you the opportunity to support the development of the community and platform.

third.question: How can I cancel my subscription?
third.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account on the platform. Access to paid materials will be suspended at the end of the current month.

fourth.question: Can I pause my subscription for some time?
fourth.answer: At the moment, subscription pause is not provided. You can cancel your subscription at any time and resubscribe later.
